source_objects.description: Learn how Public Relations can help growth your business with these coures on PR, media management for start-ups to established companies.
source_objects.title: Public Relations

items.title: Effective Corporate Communications
items.headline: Learn the basics of communicating as a business.
objectives_summary: How to effectively communicate on behalf of a business.
Key elements of internal and external messaging.
Ways to increase the success of your business or brand through corporate communication methods.

items.title: LinkedIn Marketing | Achieve Your Marketing Goals‎

visible_instructors.name: Robin
visible_instructors.title: Robin & Jesper

items.headline: Learn to Use LinkedIn Marketing & Build a Converting Profile to Generate More Email Business Leads and Get More Clients
objectives_summary: Generated Email Leads from LinkedIn
Optimized Your LinkedIn profile
Connect with Your Target Audience

items.title: How to get media coverage for your business in 30 days
items.headline: How to blow up your profile with public relations, increase credibility and sales!
objectives_summary: know how to get publicity and blow up their profile
Know how to write an  impactful press release
understand and  create key messages based on USPs

items.title: Remove Negative Google Search Results: Push Down Bad Links!
items.headline: Learn how to push down or remove negative Google links, remove Google links that damage your online reputation!
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to completely remove or at least bury negative Google links

items.title: Pitch Perfect: Growth Hacker's Guide to PR & Media Coverage

visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.title: Steve Young
visible_instructors.job_title: App publicity whiz & founder of AppMasters

items.headline: The step-by-step PR system that you can use to get coverage on the top blogs even if you have no marketing experience.
objectives_summary: The ONE type of pitch that almost guarantees coverage
How to get reporters to come to you
Proven email subject lines to get the attention of any reporter

items.title: Get Major Media Coverage! Pitching Your Brand to the Press
items.headline: A step-by-step guide to creating winning brand stories journalists will be dying to cover
objectives_summary: Create a winning story angle that captures journalist attention
Narrow down the perfect shortlist of journalists to pitch to
Craft a compelling pitch that journalists can't help but respond to

items.title: How I got 300+ podcast interviews: Strategy, Tools, Scripts

visible_instructors.job_title: Media Relations Specialist, Founder of PR Agency
visible_instructors.name: Natasha
visible_instructors.title: Natasha Zo

items.headline: Easy steps to becoming your own publicist:
objectives_summary: Promote your course/service/book to thousands of people through interviews;
How to find podcasts that are hungry for your kind of expertise and personal stories;
4 ways to find anyone's email online (to contact podcast hosts);

items.title: DIY PR pitching 101 - getting press coverage... for free!

visible_instructors.name: Halima
visible_instructors.title: Halima Khatun
visible_instructors.job_title: PR consultant and DIY PR masterclass trainer

items.headline: You have a story about your business you'd love to get in the press - give yourself the best chance with this 101
objectives_summary: Pitch a story to journalists with confidence
Understand how journalists and the general media work, and how your business can maximise this
Gain great media coverage!

items.title: How to be Understood

visible_instructors.name: Zsuzsanna
visible_instructors.title: Zsuzsanna Fajcsak
visible_instructors.job_title: Live your life Alive - Performance Coaching

items.headline: The secret of effective communication
objectives_summary: Able to know how to read others communication style and chose appropriate words to make sure they understand you
To give instructions effectively
Learn the basic of influencing people and use this powerful tool positively

items.title: Media Training for Print/Online Interviews-Get Great Quotes
items.headline: How to talk to a reporter and get the exact messages and quotes you want in the final story
objectives_summary: Master newspaper interviews
Control Online news interviews
Understand the fundamentals of media interviews

items.title: Press release writing 101

visible_instructors.title: Halima Khatun
visible_instructors.name: Halima
visible_instructors.job_title: PR consultant and DIY PR masterclass trainer

items.headline: Write that press release that will get your business in the press, convey your key messages and get your more customers
objectives_summary: How to write a press release about your business that WILL get you media coverage
How to tailor your press release for different publications
The correct etiquette when it comes to emailing your publications (this is important!)

items.title: Get Local Publicity for Your Company, Yourself, Your Cause

visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Coach, Introvert Advocate, Avid Traveler
visible_instructors.name: Marcia
visible_instructors.title: Marcia Yudkin

items.headline: Publicity for local businesses, non-profits, activists, solo practitioners and entrepreneurs
objectives_summary: Create and implement a realistic plan for local publicity

items.title: Certificate Program on Media Relations in Sport
items.headline: Bunch Of Most Rated Handpicked On-Demand Video Lectures By Master Faculties Of Sports Management.
objectives_summary: The Progressive Techniques And Activities Used To Promote Sporting Events
Brand Awareness, Media Management, Message Recall, And The Examination Of Four News Mediums: Television, Internet, Print, And Radio
Dealing With Crises And Scandals In The Public Eye Within A Sporting Environment.

items.title: 7 PR Secrets All Nonprofits Should Know
items.headline: How To Build Your PR Capacity Without Breaking Your Budget
objectives_summary: The 7 secrets of PR and why every nonprofit should be thinking about them
Understand what’s important and what’s not important for nonprofit PR
Identify what makes your nonprofit unique among everyone else

items.title: How to Get Media Exposure for Your Business
items.headline: Learn how to think like a reporter to attract media attention for your business, art, product, or service!
objectives_summary: Understand what makes a news hook, and how to position yourself to be ‘media-ready’
Recognize the components of a compelling story and how to craft one that reporters can’t resist!
Learn how to create engaging pitch materials, and what critical info should be included

items.title: The Music Publicity Insider's Guide
items.headline: How to Craft News Hooks and Story Ideas That Land You Mega Media Exposure
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to take your unique musical identity and craft it into an idea the media will love
You will understand what life is like from a journalist's perspective and use that knowledge to serve their real needs and get more press as a result
You will impress your friends and business connections with the wave of free media exposure that seems to effortlessly come your way
